document.title: Music player
document.category: Team of 1, as the project leader

body.raw:
> ## Short Explanation

Chatify is a simple application for groups chat. You can invite your friends to join or create a new group chat and others people can join. You can login by google accout by one click sign in.

> ## Features

- Sign in google / Sign out
- Edit profile
- Create group chat / Join group chat
- Send image / emoji / text
  <ClImage
    publicId='v1692528416/Screenshot_2023-08-20_at_17.45.27_vrnaun.png'
    width={2400}
    height={900}
    className='rounded-2xl'
  />
- Reaction message
- Delete message

> ## Lessons Learned

Practice using and familiarizing yourself with the firebase database. Improve your real-time processing skills with live chat

document.title: Chatify
document.description: Personal Chat Room or Workspace to share resources and hangout with friends
document.category: Team of 1, as the project leader

body.raw:
> ## Short Explanation Chatify is a simple application for groups chat. You can invite your friends to join or create a new group chat and others people can join. You can login by google accout by one click sign in. > ## Features
  • Sign in google / Sign out
  • Edit profile
  • Create group chat / Join group chat
  • Send image / emoji / text
  • Reaction message - Delete message
> ## Lessons Learned Practice using and familiarizing yourself with the firebase database. Improve your real-time processing skills with live chat
